title: Xbox Game Pass is Cannibalizing Game Sales - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.13.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Imran is back! He joins Tim to talk about NPD sales, Xbox Game Pass cannibalizing sales, and Metroid Prime Remastered not crediting the original devs properly.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
 - Magic Mike’s Last Dance in Review is up right now. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - If you missed it, Barrett and I did a trailer breakdown of the 2nd Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom trailer from last week’s direct. You can check that out over on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames
The Roper Report   -
00:03:53 - Dead Space Was the Best-Selling New Game in the U.S. in January 2023
00:17:30 - Microsoft confirms Game Pass cannibalizes sales
00:27:53 - Original Metroid Prime devs criticize remaster for omitting credits
00:37:00 - The Super Mario Bros Movie Super Bowl ad brings back the Super Show rap
00:46:09 - Dead Island 2 is coming out a week early
00:48:17 - Psychonauts 2's Making-Of Documentary Is Now Available to Everyone for Free
00:53:45 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:30 - “Is The Legend of Zelda an RPG Franchise?” - newajseyes
00:59:34 - You‘re Wrong
